t: What is the difference between Hanes Blue Label ...
s: I can't find anything on the Hanes website. But, after purchasing both, I can tell you the blue label t-shirts are more of the value line. The red label shirts are slightly more expensive, did not shrink like the blue label, seem more durable than the blue label, and are a softer cotton.
